parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the instance. You can call the [ListInstances](~~141936~~) or [GetInstance](~~141567~~) operation to query the ID of the instance.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page to return.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page.

parameters.name: Tid
parameters.description:
The ID of the tenant.

>  To view the ID of the tenant, move the pointer over the profile picture in the upper-right corner of the Data Management (DMS) console. For more information, see the "View information about the current tenant" section of the [Manage DMS tenants](~~181330~~) topic.

parameters.name: UserName
parameters.description:
The nickname of the user. You can call the [ListUsers](~~141938~~) or [GetUser](~~147098~~) operation to query the nickname of the user.

>  The value of the NickName parameter is that of the UserName parameter.
